name: Modifications au règlement intérieur du Parlement - Amendments to Parliament's Rules of Procedure - Änderung der Geschäftsordnung des Parlaments -  - Gabriele Bischoff - Proposition de décision
title: Amendments to Parliament's Rules of Procedure concerning Rules 99, 197, 213, 214, 222, 223, 230, 235, Annex V and the addition of a new Rule 106a
